title: Trump tells Europe to ‘get your act together’ on immigration before US-EU trade talks
description: Ursula von der Leyen will meet with US president on Sunday, who describes ‘20 sticking points’ in negotiations
content:
Intensive negotiations are continuing on Saturday between the EU and the US before a crunch meeting in Scotland between Donald Trump and the European Commission president, Ursula von der Leyen, to avert a costly trade war.
Trump spent the night at hi... [3645 chars]

title: Five killed as Ukraine and Russia trade drone attacks
description: Three people die in strikes on Dnipro in Ukraine, while two are killed in Russia's Rostov region.
content:
Zelensky said Russian strikes also targeted Kharkiv and Sumy, and added on X that the strikes "cannot be left without response, and Ukrainian long-range drones ensure one".
He added that Russian military sites and airports "must see that Russia's own... [1636 chars]

title: Belgian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen wins sprint race
description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen holds off the McLarens of Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris to win a tense sprint race at the Belgian Grand Prix.
content:
Piastri had taken one of the most impressive pole positions of the year on Friday, by nearly 0.5secs, but in the end McLaren paid the price for running slightly more downforce than Verstappen.
Piastri was always going to be vulnerable on the first la... [2714 chars]

title: Reform UK chief erupts as migrant hotel protest 'censored' under new law
description: One of the Act's most contentious aspects is its requirement that platforms remove content that exhibits offences under the Public Order Act.
content:
Zia Yusuf is concerned the law will censor footage of protests, such as those outside the Bell Hotel
